name: Deathless Initiate

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 13, Con 13, orc or half-orc, Diehard, Endurance, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: You are not staggered while using the Diehard feat, but if you take a move and a standard action or a full-round action while you are at 0 or fewer hit points you take 1 point of damage. Further, while using the Diehard feat, you gain a +2 bonus on melee attacks and damage rolls.
sections.name: Benefits

description: For you, impending death is a call to wrath.
